name: govcore/govcore_media
description: Slick media handling for GovCore. So cool you'll make the A/C jealous.

suggest.drupal/dropzonejs: Required for GovCore Media Bulk Upload, which provides an easy way to upload multiple media files at once.
suggest.drupal/entity_browser: Used by GovCore Media Image to improve image fields.
suggest.drupal/image_widget_crop: Adds cropping functionality to GovCore Media Image.
suggest.drupal/inline_entity_form: Allows entity browsers to create media items from file uploads and embed codes.
suggest.drupal/media_entity_instagram: Required for GovCore Media Instagram, which provides an Instagram media type.
suggest.drupal/media_entity_twitter: Required for GovCore Media Twitter, which provides a tweet media type.
suggest.drupal/slick_entityreference: Required for GovCore Media Slideshow, which provides a simple carousel media type.
suggest.enyo/dropzone: Provides a JavaScript library required by the DropzoneJS module.
suggest.vardot/blazy: Provides a JavaScript library required by the Slick module.
